channel.title: [Help] - COMPILER ERROR - [Help]
channel.description:
Source: Soul Split based off PI Problem: When I trade the skill cape shop it disconnects me. The shop is using a skillcape() method to put items in the shop.
[code]NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 32895 at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:222) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:330) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8312) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:8922) at client.method146(client.java:11986) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8144) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8856) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4674) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
Above ^ is my compiler error. Please help if you can...
Here are the lines of code that the compiler threw an error to...
Lines 8312 - 8313 in client.java [code]Sprite class30_sub2_sub1_sub1_2 = ItemDef.getSprite(j9, class9_1.invStackSizes[i3], l9); if(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1_2 != null) {[/code]
Lines 8921 - 8922 in client.java [code]method119(anInt945, openInterfaceID); drawInterface(0, 0, RSInterface.interfaceCache[openInterfaceID], 0);[/code]
Lines 11986 - 11987 in client.java [code]draw3dScreen(); aRSImageProducer_1165.drawGraphics(4, super.graphics, 4);[/code]
Lines 8143 - 8144 in client.java [code]if(loadingStage == 2) method146();[/code]
Lines 8855 - 8857 in client.java [code]else drawGameScreen(); anInt1213 = 0;[/code]
Lines 4673 - 4674 in client.java [code]} else { super.run();[/code]
Lines 221 - 223 in ItemDef.java [code]ItemDef itemDef = cache[cacheIndex]; stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[i]; itemDef.id = i;[/code]
Lines 330 - 332 in ItemDef.java [code]ItemDef itemDef = forID(i) ; if(itemDef.stackIDs == null) j = -1;[/code]
Line 108 in RSApplet.java [code]processDrawing();[/code]
Here is the error T1 [code]signlink.reporterror("T1 - " + pktType + "," + pktSize + " - " + anInt842 + "," + anInt843);[/code]
- Thanks Grant

item.title: [Help] - COMPILER ERROR - [Help]
item.dc:creator: @Gsempire Gsempire
item.description:
@Gsempire wrote:

Source: Soul Split based off PI
Problem: When I trade the skill cape shop it disconnects me. The shop is using a skillcape() method to put items in the shop.

NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 32895 at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:222) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:330) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8312) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:8922) at client.method146(client.java:11986) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8144) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8856) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4674) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Above ^ is my compiler error. Please help if you can…

Here are the lines of code that the compiler threw an error to…

Lines 8312 - 8313 in client.java

Sprite class30_sub2_sub1_sub1_2 = ItemDef.getSprite(j9, class9_1.invStackSizes[i3], l9); if(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1_2 != null) {

Lines 8921 - 8922 in client.java

method119(anInt945, openInterfaceID); drawInterface(0, 0, RSInterface.interfaceCache[openInterfaceID], 0);

Lines 11986 - 11987 in client.java

draw3dScreen(); aRSImageProducer_1165.drawGraphics(4, super.graphics, 4);

Lines 8143 - 8144 in client.java

if(loadingStage == 2) method146();

Lines 8855 - 8857 in client.java

else drawGameScreen(); anInt1213 = 0;

Lines 4673 - 4674 in client.java

} else { super.run();

Lines 221 - 223 in ItemDef.java

ItemDef itemDef = cache[cacheIndex]; stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[i]; itemDef.id = i;

Lines 330 - 332 in ItemDef.java

ItemDef itemDef = forID(i) ; if(itemDef.stackIDs == null) j = -1;

Line 108 in RSApplet.java

processDrawing();

Here is the error T1

signlink.reporterror("T1 - " + pktType + "," + pktSize + " - " + anInt842 + "," + anInt843);
  • Thanks Grant

Read full topic
